mapper.select: SELECT '' AS VENDOR_DIV, SMTP_ADDR, J_1KFTIND, J_1KFTBUS, BRSCH, KUNNR, REPLACE(REPLACE(NAME1, char(13), ''), char(10), ' ') AS NAME1, KTOKD, STCD2, REPLACE(REPLACE(J_1KFREPRE, char(13), ''), char(10), ' ') AS J_1KFREPRE, REPLACE(REPLACE(TELF1, char(13), ''), char(10), ' ') AS TELF1, REPLACE(REPLACE(TELFX, char(13), ''), char(10), ' ') AS TELFX, PSTLZ, REPLACE(REPLACE(ORT01, char(13), ''), char(10), ' ') AS ORT01, REPLACE(REPLACE(STRAS, char(13), ''), char(10), ' ') AS STRAS FROM IF_EPMS_VENDOR WHERE ( NAME1 LIKE '%' ||#{find}|| '%' OR KUNNR LIKE '%' ||#{find}|| '%' ) AND SPERR = 'Y' ORDER BY NAME1
